info.title: Banking System API Documentation
info.description:
The Banking System API provides a comprehensive set of endpoints for managing banking-related operations. It is designed to support various banking activities such as account management, transaction processing, and exchange rate management. This API is built with scalability and security in mind, ensuring seamless integration with client applications.

Key Features:
Account Management: Create, retrieve, update, and delete accounts. Perform operations such as deposits, withdrawals, and transfers.
Transaction Processing: Retrieve transaction histories, manage transaction records, and delete transactions securely.
Exchange Rates: Manage exchange rates for supported currencies, including retrieval, creation, updates, and deletions.
Logging: Detailed request and response logging to facilitate debugging and auditing.
RESTful Design: Follows RESTful principles with predictable endpoints, standard HTTP methods, and meaningful status codes.
Swagger Documentation: Integrated Swagger/OpenAPI support for testing and visualizing API capabilities.
